    Git like a Boss


    Git Basics / Creating a Repository

    A repository is where your committed files will live and they can contain multiple branches based on your needs such as collaborating with others.

    To make your initial repository go to this link or hit "new" on the top left of your github homepage

    Navigate to your repsoitory on the left and copy the link from the "clone or download" drop down. Drop this link under VCS>Git>Remotes
